title: Bug 15899 - Close All Saved does not always work
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature does not always function correctly. Specifically, when attempting to close all editors and files, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not have any effect.
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature does not always function. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new file f1.txt
2. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu
3. Observe that nothing happens (all editors and files remain open)
